channel.title: Server name change
channel.description:
hello, i have finally found 614 server :) but the problem now, that i want to change the server name, its really hard to edit 614 server :( one more think, how can i jar the server, when i open jar creator i got this message

item.title: Server name change
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

mortal4combat:

i have client and source, the server name is spawnscape, i want to change it to other name and i want to jar it to let players join it.

Alright, well, look for settings.cfg or settings.txt, if you find it there should be something like

If not, go into each file and do Ctrl + F and search for spawnscape, that’s probably the easiest way to change it. Change wherever it says spawnscape to your “server” name and save. When you’re done, you’ll have to compile. You’ll find most instances of “Spawnscape” in client.java. Remember you are looking for it in the server and client files.

As for making the client jarred, there are plenty of tutorials out there for doing so.

[b]Tip: If you want to find absolutely every instance of a string of text, use a program called Windows Grep, it’s a good tool for bulk searching.

Read full topic

item.title: Server name change
item.dc:creator: @mortal4combat mortal4combat
item.description:
@mortal4combat wrote:

i have client and source, the server name is spawnscape, i want to change it to other name and i want to jar it to let players join it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server name change
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Alright, so I’m seeing two problems in your posting…

  1. You want to change the server name.
  2. You want to JAR something?

There is a server, and a client. The server actually runs the game, the client connects to the server and allows players to play the game. I cannot see why you would want to JAR the server, makes no sense. Anyways, are these two questions linked together? Are you trying to achieve a name-change server wide by jarring it?

More information please.

Read full topic
